unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are You *Really* Seeing Results?**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Are You *Really* Seeing Results?**

unnormalised: Hey fam, getting those influencer marketing campaigns ready for Diwali? Don't just throw money at it like you're distributing sweets after winning a cricket match! You gotta check those follower analytics.
normalised: Hey fam, getting those influencer marketing campaigns ready for Diwali? Don't just throw money at it like you're distributing sweets after winning a cricket match! You gotta check those follower analytics.

unnormalised: Seriously, are those "followers" even real? We're talking beyond just looking at the numbers. Deep dive! What’s the engagement rate? Are they bots from Borivali or genuine folks interested in that amazing biryani recipe your influencer's promoting?
normalised: Seriously, are those "followers" even real? We're talking beyond just looking at the numbers. Deep dive! What's the engagement rate? Are they bots from Borivali or genuine folks interested in that amazing biryani recipe your influencer's promoting?

unnormalised: Companies like "Desi Data," based out of Bengaluru, are popping up offering super granular follower analysis. Think age demographics, location down to the ward level, and even interest categories - like hardcore Bollywood fans vs. yoga enthusiasts.
normalised: Companies like "Desi Data," based out of Bengaluru, are popping up offering super granular follower analysis. Think age demographics, location down to the ward level, and even interest categories - like hardcore Bollywood fans versus yoga enthusiasts.

unnormalised: They're helping brands understand if they're reaching the right audience. No point in promoting organic cotton sarees to a crowd of gamers, right?
normalised: They're helping brands understand if they're reaching the right audience. No point in promoting organic cotton sarees to a crowd of gamers, right?

unnormalised: This isn’t just about vanity metrics anymore. It’s about ROI. And understanding your follower data is the key to unlocking real, tangible results. So, before you sign off on that next big influencer campaign, dig into those analytics! Your budget (and your boss) will thank you!
normalised: This isn't just about vanity metrics anymore. It's about R O I. And understanding your follower data is the key to unlocking real, tangible results. So, before you sign off on that next big influencer campaign, dig into those analytics! Your budget (and your boss) will thank you!
